Header: Ambassador for the Kingdom of the Netherlands
Content: H.E. Joanne Doornewaard, Ambassador for the Kingdom of the Netherlands in Sri Lanka, paid a courtesy call at the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) on Friday (8) and had an official meeting with the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Darshana Hettiarrachchi. The Ambassador and her staff discussed matters pertaining to the Civil-Military Coordination and Reconciliation Process within the Jaffna Peninsula. The Commander Security Forces - Jaffna provided a comprehensive briefing on the status quo of the process and continuing land release projects and resettlement. A few Senior Army Officers were also present at the meeting.
